job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Video 5+ years Bachelors Degree or equivalent work experience We are looking for a Machine Learning (Client) Engineer to help us create business intelligence products that support financial and technical objectives. Machine Learning Engineer responsibilities include staging and cleaning data, developing machine learning models, maintaining Client systems, and occasionally presenting findings to executives. To do this job successfully, you need exceptional skills in statistics and programming. This team member will be working with subject matter experts in Accounting, Marketing, Engineering, and Finance. Remote until covid restrictions are lifted.
